column1: #Text=Tom 's proposal as a way out of the difficulty , and the prompt seconding of it by Mr. Damon , seemed to deprive the other bank officials , Mr. Swift included , of the power of speech for a few moments .
#Text=Then , as there came to the room where the scene had taken place , the sound of the mob outside , clamoring for cash , Mr. Pendergast , the president , remarked in a low voice :
#Text=" It seems to be the only way .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= I 'm sure of it , as far as my electric car is concerned , " replied the young inventor .

column1: #Text=" If we get the cash I 'll have it back here on time .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= Then do n't lose any time , Tom , " advised his father .

#Text= Just imagine you 're racing for that three-thousand-dollar prize , offered by the Touring Club of America , Tom , " observed Mr. Damon , as he deposited the valise at his feet .

column1: #Text=" I do n't have to do that , " replied the youth .
#Text=" I 'm trying for a bigger prize than that .
#Text=The vehicle quickly gathered headway and was soon fairly whizzing along .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text=If we keep this up we 'll be there and back in good time ,  remarked Mr. Damon .

#Text= Yes , but we ca n't do it , " replied his companion .

column1: #Text=" The road to Clayton is a poor one , and we 'll soon be on it .

column3:
_	_	_	_

#Text= I know it , " answered Tom , " and I 'm going to count every minute .
